mapper.insert: insert into hopeboard(seq, title, writer, content, author) values((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from hopeboard),#{title},#{writer},#{content}, #{author})
mapper.select:
SELECT seq, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, cnt, author FROM ( SELECT seq, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, cnt, author, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY seq DESC) AS RNUM FROM hopeboard ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT COUNT(seq) FROM hopeboard WHERE seq > 0
update hopeboard set cnt = cnt + 1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: update hopeboard set title=#{title}, author=#{author}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
